# 3rd Sailing the Macro Workshop

### September 8-10, Ortygia, Siracusa, Italy

## Additional information about the workshop will be made available on May 15, 2023


Until then, we invite authors to submit their original, unpublished research papers or extended abstracts to be considered for presentation at the conference.

Please submit your paper via email as a PDF file to the address [smw-dipecodir@uniroma1.it](mailto:smw-dipecodir@uniroma1.it) with the subject line **"Sailing the Macro Submission"**
